document.description: Berlitz Where to Go in Hong Kong
document.name: WhereToHongKong

lexUnit.definition: FN: (of desirable entities) cover in such a way as to be attractive.

sentence.text: A saving grace is the stone wall nearby that adorns the eight-mile ridge between Dent and Ireby , a monumental task undertaken by rough men long before the coming of trade unions .

` Lady , you adorn my house , " he said , then looked past her at Turakina .

Porcelain friezes adorn the rooftops and ridgepoles , telling the story of the Romance of the Three Kingdoms .
Golden Buddha statues in several of Buddha 's aspects adorn the temples , and overlooking them is the 17 - story Flower Pagoda , a slender relic of the Song dynasty ( a.d. 960 - 1279 ) .
